SELECT *
FROM payment_intents
WHERE created < :P1 /* {{NOW.dateAdd('minutes', -60).formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd h:mm:ss')}} */ AND stripe_charge IS NOT NULL

SELECT value
FROM settings
WHERE name = 'STRIPE_account_id'

DELETE
FROM payment_intents
WHERE created < :P1 /* {{NOW.dateAdd('minutes', -60).formatDate('yyyy-MM-dd h:mm:ss')}} */
